{"id":848006608,"question_id":279,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 3 months","timestamp":1669121166,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"95 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/848006608/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Perfect Squares","memory":"5.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int numSquares(int n) {\n        int dp[10001] = {0, };\n        for(int i = 1; i < n + 1; i++) dp[i] = 10001;\n        for(int i = 1; i < sqrt(n + 1); i++){\n            for(int j = 0; i*i+j < n + 1; j++){\n                if(dp[j + i * i] > dp[j] + 1){\n                    dp[j + i * i] = dp[j] + 1;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return dp[n];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"perfect-squares","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
